divs: Sighting DetailsIn Food lion parking lot,Mountain City , Tn. I pulled in to park and everyone was looking at the sky above the store. As I walked toward the entrance a woman asked me "whats that"? I looked up and saw a ring shaped object < 500ft above the store. there was fire coming out the bottom of the entire ring like a rocket, but no smoke, no trail. the center appeared hollow. it moved slowly across the sky towards the west.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Mountain City
There were no other sightings in Mountain City on or around September 12th 2008
Summary: RING OF FIRE, PROPULSION ORIENTED DOWNWARD. NO EMMISIONS, NO TRAIL, CLEAN COMBUSTION. APPEARED TO BE EMPTY IN CENTER OF CRAFT. MOVED AT ABOUT 25 MPH OVER FOOD LION, MOUNTAIN CITY, TN. CONTINUED WEST TOWARDS DOE MOUNTAINS.
